definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (Ph. [[גרא]]) son of Benjamin Ge 46:21 (lacking Nu 26:38–Nu 26:40); son of Belaï, & grandson of Benj., acc. to 1Ch 8:3, 1Ch 8:5 cf. v:1Ch 8:7; designation of a Benjamite family or clan; hence Ehud called [[בֶּן־גֵּרָא]] Ju Jdg 3:15, & so Shimei, 2Sa 16:5, 2Sa 19:17, 2Sa 19:19, 1Ki 2:8.
